commitResults.messageTitle: Rename main class to Launcher, add Phuc class for chat bot
Level 0. Rename, Greet, Exit
Make the echo method in Userinterface and change Phuc to read the user input and respond echo or bye
Modified the action to addlist
Add the methods for add and list action in Ui
Change the method to only recieve the command from people then process it
Take the command from Phuc chat bot and then parse the command then answer throught Ui
Describe a task and some method in it
I change some methods to meet the need of the command
I change some name to meet the OOP name's rule
i make the ToDoTask.java extends from Task.java
i make the DeadlineTask.java extends from Task.java
i make the EventTask.java extends from Task.java
i modify the ProcessInput.java to process the command and UserInterface.java to respond the corresponded command.
TextUiTesting
I make PhucException.java to handle exception of Phuc chat bot.
I modify every class to make the chat bot handle all the exception until now, i also add some emoji to make the chat bot not too boring.
i have change the task list in UserInterface.java to ArrayList and also impliment the method delete in UserInterface.java
Do the input and output to become the test cases of the chat bot
Add Storage class: add file persistence layer
commitResults.messageBody:
- Implement Storage class with save/load functionality
- Add file format handling for all task types (T|D|E)
- Create data directory automatically if missing
- Use pipe-separated format: T|true|description

commitResults.messageTitle: Update Tasks: add constructors with isDone parameter
commitResults.messageBody:
Since when i read the input file from phuc.txt, there are many information that need to add in a task while the constructor right now haven't have the method to take in the isDone parameter so i need to add another way to construct a task

Let's
* add new constructors to Task, DeadlineTask, EventTask, ToDoTask
* accept isDone parameter for loading from storage
* maintain backward compatibility with existing code

commitResults.messageTitle: Update UserInterface.java, ProcessInput.java and Phuc.java: integrate storage with user interface
commitResults.messageBody:
Since the storage need to behave and do many actions like load the data from hardcode or save the new data to hard code so i need to change the ProcessInput and UserInterface as well as Phuc to meet the require action to the data file

Let's
* add Storage dependency to UserInterface
* implement load() method to load tasks from file
* implement saveToStorage() method for automatic saving
* update task counting to use ArrayList size instead of manual count

commitResults.messageTitle: Update ErrorHandler.java: enhance error handling for storage operations
commitResults.messageBody:
Since reading a file or save the data to the file may cause many exception so i need to update it to handle these situation

Let's
* add IOException handling for file operations
* create custom PhucException for storage errors
* improve error messages for file operations
* add input validation and trimming in Storage.load()

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-Level-7' into master
Add DateTimeProcess.java for date parsing and formatting
commitResults.messageBody:
Add DateTimeProcess class for date/time handling

Since we have to deal with the Date and Time, make the data more meaningful, i make this class to handle these data

Let’s
* Implement comprehensive date parsing with multiple input formats
* Add output formatting for display and file storage
* Support both date-only and date-time inputs
* Include ISO format support for compatibility

commitResults.messageTitle: Update task classes to use LocalDateTime
commitResults.messageBody:
Update task: migrate from String to LocalDateTime for dates to make it more meaningful

Let's
* modify DeadlineTask to use LocalDateTime instead of String
* modify EventTask to use LocalDateTime for start/end times
* update constructors to accept LocalDateTime parameters
* implement new writeToFile() methods using DateTimeProcess
* maintain backward compatibility with existing functionality

commitResults.messageTitle: Enhance ErrorHandler with date validation
commitResults.messageBody:
Add date format validation and error handling

Let's
* add ERROR_DATE_FORMAT constant for user-friendly messages
* implement validateAndParseDateTime() method in ErrorHandler
* add date format validation to event and deadline validation
* include time order validation for events (end after start)
* provide clear error messages for invalid date formats

commitResults.messageTitle: Update ProcessInput to handle date parsing
commitResults.messageBody:
Integrate date parsing in ProcessInput

Let's
* modify handleEvent() to parse and validate date strings
* update handleDeadline() to use DateTimeProcess for parsing

commitResults.messageTitle: Update UserInterface for LocalDateTime support
commitResults.messageBody:
Update the UserInterface to make it appropriate with other class

Let's
* change deadline() method to accept LocalDateTime instead of String
* modify event() method to use LocalDateTime for start/end times
* remove redundant date parsing from UI methods
* maintain existing user output format and messaging
* ensure consistent date display across the application

commitResults.messageTitle: Enhance Storage class for date serialization
commitResults.messageBody:
Update the storage to read new file and also load new kind of fil

Let's
* modify load() method to parse date strings from file using DateTimeProcess
* update save() method to use DateTimeProcess.formatForFile()
* add error handling for corrupted date entries in storage file

commitResults.messageTitle: Update automatic testing
commitResults.messageBody: Update the input and output to check with new format of time

commitResults.messageTitle: Add TaskList for control the list of tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
Since the ArrayList<Task> may cause some type error when the project is bigger, i add the TaskList class for type safe

Let's
* implement basic TaskList class with ArrayList backing
* add core methods: add, get, remove, size, isEmpty, clear

commitResults.messageTitle: Update Storage and UserInterface for fit the TaskList
commitResults.messageBody: Since the last time, it is ArrayList<Task> so i change everything to TaskList type and change some method to meet the new TaskList method
